in april of 2019 a thread was started on
the paranormal board of 4chan where the
original poster said that about a year
ago his sister committed suicide and he
moved into her room
he mentioned that two of her main
interests were music and the occult
what's strange is that whenever he plays
the guitar or piano in the room weird
things happen
he provides this video as an example
[Music]
the thread progressed with people asking
for more information and we learned that
she was a complete shut-in
this was exacerbated by the fact that he
was often mean to her which led to the
question of whether or not she was
coming back out of resentment toward him
he eventually posted he's going to try
to communicate with her further and a
little over an hour later uploads this
video
the video begins with them hooking up
the guitar to an amp and playing the
piano a bit
[Music]
not long after this happens
[Music]
the latter part of the video consists of
him asking his sister a series of
questions
can we do that thing where it's uh
one strum means yes
two means no
this is
cislaney
is the afterlife good
i don't know
[Music]
are you haunting me because you're
mad at me
[Music]
as the story progressed and the thread
gained more attention
op posted yet again another video
hey guys so for this video i wanted to
address a few things and then just show
you uh something that i found
this video was just of him finding a
makeshift ouija board under his bed
the back of the board has the words fly
screw crack law drug hack site and
moscow written on it
other than this no paranormal activity
takes place
after op reported feeling pangs in his
chest and other signs of distress
he figured it would be safer to not stay

after looking through his sister's

anyway so

he plays as one of the songs

the post in the thread began to take a
darker turn from here on out
op says that he's getting the feeling
there is more than one spirit present
with him and the chest pangs are growing
stronger
some people in the thread were warning
him that this spirit might not be a
sister but rather a parasitic demon
this theory stemmed from a pattern
people detected in no peace family
he earlier mentioned that his
grandmother was an amazing pianist but
after she got arthritis she had a mental
breakdown and tried to chop off her
fingers
after the grandmother died op's sister
became musically inclined a shut-in and
later committed suicide
after opie's sister death he's not
claiming to be more of a hermit and more

any interest in it before
in the words of the 4chan community it
was attaching itself to a new host every

die
the last post that caesar made on the
thread stated that he is going out to
visit a friend who was knowledgeable
about the occult for advice on what to
do next and that he would update us
later
he never updated the threat again nor
did he upload another youtube video
it's been over a month since this
happened
this was an interesting thread to read
and the videos were fairly well done
however none of this stands up to
scrutiny
we can start by trying to figure out if
his dead sister ever actually existed
beginning with the first video he
uploaded judging by the wall color alone
this does look like a stereotypical
girl's room but obviously the
observation alone means nothing
in his final video we do get a small
shot of a collage of photographs
i tried to see if there were any
pictures of what could be his sister but
with the 480p quality it's not possible
to get very good look
there is one final effort to identify a
sister however
in the 4chan thread he mentioned a
couple of times that he lives in
southern california
additionally in his second video the
first thing he asks his sibling
apparition is this
um
this is
cislaney
so with that you can try to find the
obituary of anyone named delaney from
california in the last year i tried this
with various different spellings and
couldn't find a match
it seems laney never actually existed or
if she does she isn't dead
it's also worth noting it's a little odd
he never decided to go through her
computer until a year after her death
but had no problem moving into her room
and using her instruments his reason for
faking all this could have just been for
attention
but to me it seems like this is an
attempt to promote his music
you can see that he's pretty talented by
the way he plays piano and on the 4chan
thread he even said that he was
considering putting his sister's music
up on soundcloud
i'm pretty sure this is his music with
the knowledge of this is a hoax
that leaves us with the question of how
he pulled off some of these effects
the first video where the guitar is
hitting the wall and the last video
where the object falls onto the ground
don't seem too difficult to fake using
string or something
the second video where he's
communicating with his sister via guitar
however looks like it required a little
more creativity i don't know for sure
how he did it but there is something
interesting i noticed
for this entire video the head of the
guitar is always propped behind this
pillow
it never moves from that spot
and when the guitar is shaking the
pillow also shakes with it
at one point in the video
the guitar starts to slide off the bed
and you can see the pillow sort of pull
itself back and hold the guitar from
falling further
i think there is something behind the
pillow causing it to move
overall this threat was really fun to
follow but it might have been a bit more
